entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Rain along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
